pros: Flexible work environment and lots of nice people.
cons: Very low salaries and benefits were all very low.

job_title: Full Time Faculty in Sterling, KS
pros: Sterling College offers a discount on employee lunch and an easy work schedule.
cons: If you are interviewing for an academic position, I would move on quickly. Most faculty will quit within 4 years of being hired. There is a sense of moral exhaustion over keeping the student enrollment high while trying to teach at the collegiate level. The pay is not competitive, the standard of education is below average, and the academic staff is poorly managed and underappreciated. During my tenure, I was pressured to lower my standards of education.

job_title: Assistant Professor Behavioral Science in Sterling, KS
pros: Good people who care for the students they teach.
cons: Unfair salary rules and special contracts for some faculty.
